title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
Upgrade your DIY game with the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set! This general household hand kit is perfect for small repairs and DIY projects. With a total of 39 essential tools included such as a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure, you'll have everything you need right at your fingertips.

Crafted with durability in mind, these tools are heat treated and chrome plated for long-lasting use. Plus, they are corrosion-resistant, ensuring they will stand the test of time. The plastic toolbox storage case keeps everything organized with tool compartments, making it easy to find what you need when you need it.

Not only is this tool set practical, but it's also portable. The lightweight design and carrying handle allow you to easily take your tools on the go. Whether you're a DIY amateur or an avid handyman, this set is ideal for anyone looking to tackle projects around the house.

Don't miss out on this must-have tool set in a vibrant orange color. It also makes a great gift idea for the handy person in your life. Upgrade your toolbox today with the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set!
